assignment1

Interface State

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StateReduced, StateSimple

    public interface State
    This interface contains the basic methods all state representations must implement.
    Author:
    josago

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int[] AGENT_ACTIONS 
      static int AGENT_MOVE_EAST 
      static int AGENT_MOVE_NORTH 
      static int AGENT_MOVE_SOUTH 
      static int AGENT_MOVE_STAY 
      static int AGENT_MOVE_WEST 
      static int ENVIRONMENT_SIZE 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object clone()
      Clones this object.
      int getX(Agent agent)
      Returns the X coordinate of an agent.
      int getY(Agent agent)
      Returns the Y coordinate of an agent.
      boolean isFinal()
      Returns true if the state is final (predator and prey are on the same square), false otherwise.
      void move(Agent agent)
      Executes the policy of an agent and then moves it.
      void move(Agent agent, int action)
      Moves an agent in the specified direction (from AGENT_MOVE_*), even if the movement is not possible by its policy.
      java.util.Iterator<State> stateIterator()
      Returns an iterator which will loop through each and every possible state of this representation only once.

    • Method Detail

      • stateIterator

        java.util.Iterator<State> stateIterator()
        Returns an iterator which will loop through each and every possible state of this representation only once.
        Returns:
        A state iterator

      • isFinal

        boolean isFinal()
        Returns true if the state is final (predator and prey are on the same square), false otherwise.
        Returns:
        True if the state is final, false otherwise.

      • getX

        int getX(Agent agent)
        Returns the X coordinate of an agent.
        Parameters:
        agent - An agent.
        Returns:
        The X coordinate of the specified agent.

      • getY

        int getY(Agent agent)
        Returns the Y coordinate of an agent.
        Parameters:
        agent - An agent.
        Returns:
        The Y coordinate of the specified agent.

      • move

        void move(Agent agent)
        Executes the policy of an agent and then moves it.
        Parameters:
        agent - The agent to move.

      • move

        void move(Agent agent,
        int action)
        Moves an agent in the specified direction (from AGENT_MOVE_*), even if the movement is not possible by its policy.
        Parameters:
        agent - The agent to move.
        action - The action to take (from AGENT_MOVE_*).

      • clone

        java.lang.Object clone()
        Clones this object.
        Returns:
        A clone of this object.
